reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://acc-test.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Click the 'Menu' link to show the navigation menu items.
Click the 'Content' menu link.
Click the 'Add content' link.
Click the 'Character Profile' link.
Enter 'Charactera4548e738e0c411' in the 'Character First Name' text box.
Click the Cover Photo 'Select' button.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Character Profile Charactera4548e738e0c411 has been created.' is present.
Click the 'Content' menu link.
Click the 'Add content' link.
Click the 'Movie' link.
Click the 'Cast/Crew' link.

Enter 'Charactera4548e738e0c411' in the 'Character' text box.
Click the 'Charactera4548e738e0c411' from the auto complete option list.
Scroll to and click the 'Basic Information' tab.
Enter 'Moviedee493ac0436498' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Enter the file path for file upload.

Verify the value of the 'Person' text box equals 'Person60c0bd2617a44a0'.
Verify the value of the 'Role' drop down list equals 'Character'.
Verify the value of the 'Character' text box equals 'Charactera4548e738e0c411'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Check the 'Create New Revision' checkbox.
Select 'Published' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify the text 'Published' is present in the work bench info block.
